name: Dominator Idle
description:
Gameplay


Dominator Idle mixes clicker games with strategy. The controls are very simple just using your left mouse button to click!

Train troops and unlock magical upgrades in the associated panels.

Troops are your main battle strength and should be the forefront of gaining more battle power.

Magical upgrades will enhance your units in battle.

Troops first, magic second.

Engage in world conquest to take over all of Earth through these battles.

Once you have taken all of the territories of earth on the attack page, prestige in order to increase your overall strength!

This will reset upgrades but give you a permanent boost to your account! The enemies you face will be more challenging but with your newfound prestige they will be no match for you!

Developer Notes


I am a solo developer of the game and will be keeping it free forever.

More content releases are planned in the future such as cutscenes and more upgrades.

Currently in early access as there is a lot that needs improving such as a balance pass, sound, art, ui etc.

I hope you all enjoy playing the game and I appreciate your feedback!

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/dkQNEFPRmG
